original_text: And you shall bring the grain offering that is made of these things to the Lord, and when it is presented to the priest, he shall bring it to the altar.
korean_text: 너는 이것들로 만든 소제물을 여호와께로 가져다가 제사장에게 줄 것이요 제사장은 그것을 제단으로 가져가서

sentences.original_text: And you shall bring the grain offering
that is made of these things
and when it is presented to the priest
he shall bring it to the altar
